title: Game-Based Social Problem-Solving Workshop for Corporate Engineering Competency Strengthening

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Engineering Theory and Understanding of Social Systems
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education using simple game tools based on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can analyze social infrastructure issues using engineering approaches through game simulations
Collaborative problem-solving strategies can be effectively applied at over 80% through team-based game activities
At least three engineering design principles applicable to real work environments can be derived based on game feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
